---
title: "Compare ABXpy scores"
output: html_document
---

Creates a file with 2+ sets of results to compare the scores

```{r}
fixed <- readr::read_delim("../results/results_fixed.csv", "\t")
egg_deltas <- readr::read_delim("../results/results_deltas.csv", "\t")
egg_1000 <- readr::read_delim("../results/results_egg_1000.csv", "\t")
features_all <- readr::read_delim("../results/results_features_all.csv", "\t")
features_no_vot <- readr::read_delim("../results/results_features_no_vot.csv", "\t")
features_vot_only <- readr::read_delim("../results/results_features_vot_only.csv", "\t")

fixed$score_fixed <- fixed$score
fixed$score <- NULL

egg_deltas$score_egg_deltas <- egg_deltas$score
egg_deltas$score <- NULL

egg_1000$score_egg_1000 <- egg_1000$score
egg_1000$score <- NULL

features_all$score_features_all <- features_all$score
features_all$score <- NULL

features_no_vot$score_features_no_vot <- features_no_vot$score
features_no_vot$score <- NULL

features_vot_only$score_features_vot_only <- features_vot_only$score
features_vot_only$score <- NULL

#fixed$place <- grepl("velar", fixed$by)


#comparison <- dplyr::inner_join(small, standard, 
#                                by=c(type_2="type_2", type_1="type_1", by="by", n="n"))
#comparison <- dplyr::inner_join(comparison, large,  
#                                by=c(type_2="type_2", type_1="type_1", by="by", n="n"))
```

```{r}


```


```{r}

comparison <- dplyr::inner_join(fixed, egg_1000,
                                by=c(type_2="type_2", type_1="type_1", by="by", n="n"))

comparison_ <- dplyr::inner_join(egg_deltas, features_all, 
                                 by=c(type_2="type_2", type_1="type_1", by="by", n="n"))
                                 
comparison__ <- dplyr::inner_join(features_no_vot, features_vot_only,
                                  by=c(type_2="type_2", type_1="type_1", by="by", n="n"))

comparison___ <- dplyr::inner_join(comparison, comparison_,
                                   by=c(type_2="type_2", type_1="type_1", by="by", n="n"))

comparison____ <- dplyr::inner_join(comparison__, comparison___,
                                   by=c(type_2="type_2", type_1="type_1", by="by", n="n"))

#write.csv(comparison, "../results/comparison_egg_deltas.csv")
```

```{bash}
rm ../results/results_deltas.csv
rm ../results/results_egg_1000.csv
```


Note: I'm not sure what changing the window length during the features extraction does, but it returns different scores. `comparison$compare` shows the results of `score_standard - score_smaller`.
